nodes.bodyText: Isn't "has changed or has not changed" the correct English?
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -182,9 +182,9 @@ public static HistoricItem historicState(Item item, AbstractInstant timestamp, S * * @param item the item to check for state changes * @param timestamp the point in time to start the check - * @return true if item state had changed, false if it hasn't or if the default - * persistence service does not refer to a {@link QueryablePersistenceService}, or null if the - * default persistence service is not available + * @return true if item state has changed, false if it did not change or if the default

nodes.bodyText: It looks/reads better using the same verb in both cases.
